# desiredKeys

**Instance Property**

An array of the record keys to retrieve.

## Declaration

```swift
var desiredKeys: [CKRecord.FieldKey]? { get set }
```

## Accessing a Zone Change Configuration

- **previousServerChangeToken**: The server change token.
- **resultsLimit**: The maximum number of records that CloudKit retrieves when fetching zone changes.
